SELECT
FROM p_wc_storeroom AS ws LEFT JOIN cy_wc AS w ON(w.WC_ID=ws.WC_ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom AS s ON(s.ID=ws.STOREROOM_ID) LEFT JOIN cy_unit_conversion AS cuc ON ( cuc.STOREROOM_ID = s.ID ) WHERE (ws.`YEAR`=#{wcStoreroom.yearForm} AND FIND_IN_SET(ws.`MONTH`,#{wcStoreroom.monthForm}))
GROUP BY ws.STOREROOM_ID,ws.WC_ID,ws.`YEAR`,ws.`MONTH`,ws.`DAY` DESC
